If you are not interested in making full tracks with me- if any one would like to help me try to replicate synth sounds like the intro to â€œno lessâ€ and the beginning of â€œsome kind of drugâ€, and try to replicate the tunings on the drum kits used, that would help me a lot! :)

item.title: G Eazy X SG Lewis Type Beats - SurfSoundMusic [Collab?]
item.dc:creator: WAVZ
item.description:
Examples of the type of instrumentals Iâ€™m trying to arrange new tracks off of are â€œSome Kind of Drug- G Eazyâ€ and any SG Lewis song- specifically â€œNo Lessâ€

The point of this post:

  1. If you are not interested in making full tracks with me- if any one would like to help me try to replicate synth sounds like the intro to â€œno lessâ€ and the beginning of â€œsome kind of drugâ€, and try to replicate the tunings on the drum kits used, that would help me a lot!

  2. If anyone is interested on working on these types of beats by sending our edited projects to each other via Auxy links do let me know. Once completed, I will post them on my social media music accounts (with given credit, and permission from you of course) to try to get our music out there, and potentially sold. I have connections with producers (their accomplishments include producing/ using their vocals for Meek Mill, Rick Ross, Logic and DJ Khaled, and more), whom offered to critique whatever projects I send to them, and maybe pass them on to other artists if we are on to something!
